data.title: A Part of Speech
data.meta_description: New York: Farrar, Straus and Giroux, 1980. First edition and first printing. Hardcover. 151 pages. A collection of poetry from this Russian born author who was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literture in 1987. A clean and tight near fine copy in cloth boards and in a very near fine dust jacket. Item #197406
data.text:
New York: Farrar, Straus and Giroux, 1980. First edition and first printing. Hardcover. 151 pages. A collection of poetry from this Russian born author who was awarded the Nobel Prize for Literture in 1987. A clean and tight near fine copy in cloth boards and in a very near fine dust jacket.

Item #197406
